resources.string: Make sure you have an active Internet connection.
Devnexus 2017 will take place in Atlanta, GA, U.S.A.

The Georgia World Congress Center (GWCC) is a world class facility located in the heart of downtown Atlanta. It is a few minutes walk from the MARTA train system and has ample parking. PARKING: Park in the RED DECK at the GWCC. You will have received an email with the PARKING CODE THAT WILL BE SCANNED UPON ENTRY FOR FREE PARKING.
Unable to initiate a phone call on this device.
